016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.api;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.DeploymentMetadata;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.RequestMetadata;
021
022import java.util.Optional;
023
024public record EventStoreMetadata(Metadata context)
025    implements RequestMetadata, DeploymentMetadata
026{
027
028    public record Builder(Metadata.Builder builder)
029        implements RequestMetadata.Builder<Builder>, DeploymentMetadata.Builder<Builder>
030    {
031        public Builder streamId(String value) {
032            builder.add("streamId", value);
033            return this;
034        }
035
036        public Builder revision(long value) {
037            builder.add("revision", value);
038            return this;
039        }
040
041        public Builder lastRevision(long value) {
042            builder.add("lastRevision", value);
043            return this;
044        }
045
046        public Builder contentType(String value) {
047            builder.add("contentType", value);
048            return this;
049        }
050
051        public Builder eventType(String value) {
052            builder.add("eventType", value);
053            return this;
054        }
055
056        public EventStoreMetadata build() {
057            return new EventStoreMetadata(builder.build());
058        }
059    }
060
061    public String streamId() {
062        return context.getString("streamId").orElseThrow();
063    }
064
065    public long revision() {
066        return context.getLong("revision").orElseThrow();
067    }
068
069    public Optional<Long> lastRevision() {
070        return context.getLong("lastRevision");
071    }
072
073    public String eventType() {
074        return context.getString("eventType").orElseThrow();
075    }
076
077    public String contentType() {
078        return context.getString("contentType").orElseThrow();
079    }
080}
